entry.title: 30.78ct Aquamarine and Diamond Vine Ring set in 14k Yellow Gold
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skyjems
Type: Aquamarine Ring
Price: 8000.00


This is a stunning Aquamarine Ring is set with a sprinkle of diamonds in an 18kt yellow gold vine setting.

Colour: Blue
Hue: slightly greenish Blue
Tone: 3 Light
Saturation: 3/6 Moderate
Treatment: None
Origin: Brazil
Notes:

Number of Stones: 30

Shape: Round
Clarity: VS2-SI1
Colour: G-H
Cut: Very Good


Shank Thickness: 1.70mm
Head Measurements: 18.65 x 17.68 mm

Total Weight of Item : 18.08 grams
